00025 #ifndef __ScaleAffectorFactory_H__
00026 #define __ScaleAffectorFactory_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgreParticleFXPrerequisites.h"
00029 #include "OgreParticleAffectorFactory.h"
00030 #include "OgreScaleAffector.h"
00031 
00032 namespace Ogre {
00033 
00035     class _OgreParticleFXExport ScaleAffectorFactory : public ParticleAffectorFactory
00036     {
00038         String getName() const { return "Scaler"; }
00039 
00041         ParticleAffector* createAffector(ParticleSystem* psys)
00042         {
00043             ParticleAffector* p = new ScaleAffector(psys);
00044             mAffectors.push_back(p);
00045             return p;
00046         }
00047     };
00048 
00049 
00050 }
00051 
00052 #endif
